group_1.textRight: Oh...

group_1.textLeft: Momoko!

group_1.textRight: Yo! @Funny we bump into each other on a holiday.

group_1.textLeft: Yes! @Are you going somewhere?

group_1.textRight: Well, I wouldn’t call it an errand, but…
Hang on! @Are you guys free right now?

group_1.textLeft: Hm? Yes, I'm free.
...Me too.

group_1.textRight: Then this is just perfect!
I guess I've finally got good timing @for once?

group_1.textLeft: Welcome!
Hey, Momoko! You’re here!
We don’t have any guests, so I've got some time @on my hands!

group_1.textRight: It'd be a shame not to use these meal @vouchers you gave me.
Hello, Tsuruno!

group_1.textLeft: You guys came, too! Come on, sit, sit!

group_1.textRight: Oh, sure...
Tsuruno, it says the only thing these vouchers @can be used for is–

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100301:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]The “Hot Winter Special!”
You'll have to wait to see what it is!

group_1.textRight: ...It doesn't taste weird, right? @Not super-spicy or super-sour?

group_1.textLeft: Wow, rude! Of course it doesn't!
Don't worry, though, the other customers gave @it the usual review!

group_1.textRight: (Fifty points...)

group_1.textLeft: Are you guys okay with that?

group_1.textRight: Ah, yes. You're treating us to it, after all...
I'm okay with it too...

group_1.textLeft: Three servings of the “Hot Winter Special,” @coming right up!
Just hang on for a little bit!

group_1.textRight: ...Um, Momoko. Are you sure this is a good idea?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm?

group_1.textRight: You’re sharing these vouchers with us…
What about Rena and Kaede?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, no worries! Both of 'em are busy today.
And besides, it's not so bad for us to hang @out and eat once in a while too, right?

group_1.textRight: ...Right! Okay, I'll take you up on your offer.
By the way...
What exactly is the “Hot Winter Special...?”

group_1.textLeft: Hmm... I guess the fun is in not knowing what @you're gonna get.

group_1.textRight: Still, if it's typical Banbanzai...
They can’t come up with anything too weird, @can they?

group_1.textLeft: Haha, maybe they’ll boil the soup more than @usual or something.
But more importantly...

group_1.textRight: Wh-what is it?
Erm...

group_1.textLeft: You two look super cute. @White really does look great in winter!

group_1.textRight: [chara:100450:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]O-oh, really...? Being complimented like this is...embarrassing...
W-well, you look really cute, too, Momoko!

group_1.textLeft: Oh… [chara:101050:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101050:cheek_2][chara:101050:face_mtn_ex_041.exp.json][chara:101050:lipSynch_1]Haha! Thank you.
I wasn't sure about getting this in white since it'll @get dirty quick, but, it was just was so cute...

group_1.textRight: Huh?!
What?!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that’s...!

group_1.textCenter: From the “Hot Winter Special Menu,” it’s @“[textRed:Stone-Grilled Mapo Tofu!]”

group_1.textLeft: Of all the things you could've made, you pick @that for when we're all wearing white?!

group_1.textCenter: Oh no, it’s bubbling and splashing out of @the bowl...!

group_1.textLeft: Stop! Tsuruno, stop!!

group_1.textCenter: Huh? But then it’ll get cold.

group_1.textRight: Eek…! Sh-she’s coming this way…!

group_1.textLeft: C'mon, let’s evacuate! @Get out of the way, hurry!

group_1.textRight: I-I’m retreating…!

group_1.textCenter: Looks like I've still got bad timing after all!

group_1.narration: After the “Stone-Grilled Mapo Tofu” @had cooled down just enough, @we all ate it together...
